nodes.text: The Star Wars Sketchbook is a Legends reference book written and illustrated by Joe Johnston with an introduction by Carol Wikarska. It details sketches used by model makers during the production of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. The book was first published in September 1977 by Ballantine Books, and it was followed by The Empire Strikes Back Sketchbook in 1980.
Shows how the incredible equipment was developed. Here, in their early stages are:
THE DEATH STAR • THE MILLENNIUM FALCONTHE LIFE POD • THE TIE FIGHTER • THE SANDCRAWLER • THE X-WING FIGHTERTHE REBEL BLOCKADE RUNNER • THE Y-WING FIGHTERTHE IMPERIAL STAR DESTROYER
